title: The Bureau
overview: The Bureau is a groundbreaking series that for the first time takes the audience inside the 21st Century FBI. As the leading law enforcement agency in the world, the FBI redefines the ways in which crimes are investigated. Today's FBI uses cutting-edge technology and evolving tactics to catch some of the world's most sophisticated criminals. They work the most dangerous and high-stake cases in the history of the bureau, pursuing serial killers, terrorists, thieves, cyber criminals, arms dealers and kidnappers. As the FBI changes, it's time for a new way to tell their stories. The Bureau matches the intensity, captures the innovation, and experiences the human drama and the passion that defines the modern FBI.
